title: TC Produkt Onboarding - SDX L - Combridge Schnittstelle (First SD LAN/WIFI)
description:
Description
Architecture ASP: Carsten Jupitz
  As a SSC/DT BS User of PANDA I want to receive Combridge costs from provider for international pricing outside the EU1. For this one user worklow within the PANDA system is assured and data transfer/communication with combridge digitalized
A webservice with Combridge is to be used for this purpose.
This service can be started from the product tile via a button exclusively for sites outside the EU1.
Thereupon the configuration data will be transmitted from PANDA to Combridge. The costs are then transmitted back to PANDA.
This is to replace the current workaround via the Combridge Excel file.

Business Scope:
As a SSC/DT BS User of PANDA I want to receive Combridge costs from provider for international pricing outside the EU1. For this one user worklow within the PANDA system is assured and data transfer/communication with combridge digitalized
acceptance_criteria:
DOD1 Button to start combridge request is implemented
DOD2 Configuration data of international sites outside of EU1 is send to Combridge JSON
DOD3 Feedback from Combridge costs is imported into PANDA
DOD4 Pricing - according to offering rules - is set on Combridge costs to receive Telekom prices for Customer (RP, PUG2, PUG3)

components.title: [PANDA_INC_SDX] Reporting the issues of the product SDX
